summary: It seems that Jack's hockey skills translate directly into tearing up the halfpenny and popping sick grinds. With his new buddy Ben by his side Jack takes off on a cross-country skateboard competition tour with hilarious results.
cast: Bernie|Louie|Jane Sowerby|David Kaye|Tony Alcantar|Cameron Bancroft|Ray Galletti|Troy Ruptash|Ian Bagg|Gus Lynch|Ian Goodman|Fred Keating|Craig March|Brant Arnold-Smith|Frank Topol|Todd Witham|Dagmar Midcap|Jenn Forgie|Danny Hagge|Jeffrey Ballard|Stanley Katz|Scott Goodman|Oliver Muirhead|Dolores Drake|Richard Karn|Robert Costanzo|Ryan Sheckler|Lauren Perkins|Patrick Cranshaw|Marnie Alton|Alex Chalmers|Bob Burnquist|Lucy|Annie|Mac|Baby Jack|Paul Dzenkiw|Allan Grant|Lucas Mattiello|Cameron Park|Trevor Morgan|Greg Parnell|Doug Sutherland|Derek Johnson|Randy Heath|Bryce Dabb|Nelson Wong|Chris Gibson|Rob 'Sluggo' Boyce|Tyler Vince|Jordan Hoffart|Nathan Lacoste|Kelly Herron|Jacqui Kaese
title: MVP: Most Vertical Primate
